entrypoint.description:
The entrypoint file of the application.

Can be a relative path from the project root or an absolute path.

outDir.description:
The output directory for the generated bundle.

Can be a relative path from the project root or an absolute path.

externalPackages.description:
An array of packages that should be excluded from the bundle.

This is useful for packages that are already installed on the system and should not be bundled.

minify.description:
Whether the generated bundle should be minified.

This is useful for production builds.

esbuildPlugins.description: Esbuild plugins. Plugins can only be added via a JavaScript config file. If you are using a JSON config file and want to add a plugin, you will need to create a `react-gtk.config.js` file and use that instead.

giVersions.description: The versions of the builtin libraries from the `gi://` namespace, that should be used in the generated bundle.
